required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: The Molecular Pathogenesis of Late-onset Fuchs' Endothelial Corneal Dystrophy
clinical_study.official_title: The Molecular Pathogenesis of Late-onset Fuchs' Endothelial Corneal Dystrophy

collaborator.agency: Fund for Scientific Research, Flanders, Belgium
Funds for Research in Ophthalmology, Belgium
Mieke Perdaens fund for Eye Research

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to gain further insights into the molecular pathogenesis of Fuchs' endothelial corneal dystrophy (FECD), to identify targets for potential specific drug therapy.

primary_outcome.time_frame: at time of prelevation (once, no intervention)
primary_outcome.description: dosage of cytokine levels in aqueous humour (exploratory, non-interventional study)

primary_outcome.time_frame: at time of prelevation (once, no intervention)
primary_outcome.description: microarray expression analysis, reverse transcriptase - quantitative polymerase chain reaction (RT-qPCR), RNA-sequencing (exploratory, non-interventional study)

primary_outcome.time_frame: at time of prelevation (once, no intervention)

arm_group.description: tissue samples from patients with late-onset Fuchs' endothelial corneal dystrophy (FECD)
tissue samples from patients with normal corneas
tissue samples from patients with corneal edema but without FECD

biospec_descr.textblock: Non-interventional study on corneal endothelium, anterior eye chamber fluid and paraffin-embedded corneal tissue, using molecular techniques to identify and characterise the molecular players involved in the pathogenesis of FECD.

study_pop.textblock: Patients with Fuchs' Endothelial Corneal Dystrophy (FECD), normal control patients, and patients with non-Fuchs edematous corneas; in university hospital setting.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- FECD
- normal corneas (including enucleations for uveal melanoma)
- non-FECD oedematous corneas
Exclusion Criteria:
- prior irradiation therapy for uveal melanoma
- corneal extension of uveal melanoma

overall_official.last_name: Joost J van den Oord, MD, PhD

facility.name: Department of Translational Cell and Tissue Research - campus Sint-Raf - UZ Leuven

patient_data.ipd_description: MEA and RT-qPCR data have been deposited in NCBI's Gene Expression Omnibus and are accessible through the Gene Expression Omnibus Series accession number GSE75676.
